Ok, guys, I had a dream about NBW, so if my posts are a bit strange, 
its cause I'm thinking things happened when they really didn't. My 
posts should make sense, I'm saying this just in case.

::Unitron/Firestarter/Choran/Predator/Imprisoner/Prowl/Kluster/Grimmle
r/Firearm/Proto/FZ::

Prowl spins around as a hole blows outward in the CF's main hatch. 
His eyes narrow, watching Unitron, Firestarter, and the three 
mercenary prisoners pile out of the ship, stopping at the shields. 
Out of the corner of his eyes, he sees Kluster, Grimmler, Firearm, 
and Proto also aiming their weapons at the Alliance group.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
FZ growls quietly, watching the Alliance bots and the prisoners 
blocked by the shields. He activates his comm-link.

"I suggest you lower your shields before my troops have to take them 
down with force. As soon as my troops are out, we'll depart and leave 
the Maximal hostage to you," he says to Iron Raptor, waiting for the 
shields to be lowered.

(Only Iron Raptor (with the codes Kluster gave her), Kluster, 
Hysteria, Firearm, and Chordate have the ability to lower the CF's 
shields).






--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "FIRE FOX" <firefox_y2k@h...> wrote:
> (I'm a little curious as well. How did Magnus get inside the CF? 
And if he 
> is, you do realize that most areas are restricted due to the 
lockdown, 
> right? Oh, Happy B-Day Roborick! Sorry it's late, but I couldn't 
get on 
> yesterday! I probably won't be able to post tomorrow, maybe late at 
night, 
> but no promises. IR, are you still posting with Diana? I haven't 
recieved 
> anything new in a while^_^)
> 
> 
> Hysteria/Tavatron
> 
> Hysteria:
> 
> The doors buckled and groaned with the blast. The horn missiles had 
> penetrated the door, and due to it's weakened moleculer structure 
had 
> created a rather good sized hole considering the density of the 
door:
> 
> CF COMP: Penetration, main entrance doors.
> 
> Hysteria dropped what she was doing and brought up a hazy image of 
the 
> blasted entry way on the console screen:
> 
> "Seal the door."
> 
> CF COMP: Unable to comply. Seal has been penetrated.
> 
> Hysteria banged a fist against the console. So much for the 
lockdown. It was 
> still in effect everywhere else, but the door HAD been penetrated. 
Well, the 
> shield was still active, though a little shaky it should hold. Plus 
the 
> ceasefire prevented the Alliance from blasting at the shields.
> 
> Tavatron:
> 
> Tavatron growled under her breath as she fought every primal 
instinct she 
> had to jump on Lion and rip him limb from limb. The waiting had 
made her 
> anxious and extremely tempermental. It was bad enough she couldn't 
shoot 
> anything, but to merely stand by while her commander was insulted 
was 
> seriously pushing it. Something had better happen, and soon.
